channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Covid Tyrants Were Perpetrators, Not Victims
item.description: The Covid 'experts' chose the unscientific tyranny of lockdowns, mandates, and petty, ineffective, legalistic rules, and they didn’t have to.

item.title: Detrans Awareness Day Heralds A Reckoning For Transgender ‘Medicine’ Fraudsters
item.description: Detransitioners' lawsuits against the medical systems that hurt them could finally undo the industry’s embrace of transgenderism.

item.title: The Crimean War’s Lessons for War and Peace in Ukraine
item.description: History repeats itself in Ukraine, but we shouldn’t reenact it blindly.

item.title: Tax the Ivies
item.description: Republicans should make universities with big endowments and multibillion-dollar foundations pay more.
